```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
image_link <- function(image, url, border = FALSE, ...) {
  border <- border * 2
  htmltools::a(
    href = url,
    htmltools::img(src = image, style = paste0("max-width: 100%;border: ", border, "px solid;"), ...)
  )
}
```
